name: Bikini Girls
description:
Bikini Girls is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap blocks by moving elements vertically or horizontally to restore the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy life. See the complete picture after completing the puzzle.

Features

  • Beautiful Art
  • High score table(Leaderboards)
  • Achievements
  • Gallery
  • Relaxing music
